name: opencode-learning-engine
description: Learns from opencode sessions to improve orchestration â€” heavily weighted toward anti-pattern detection and avoidance

scripts.test: node -e "const { LearningEngine } = require('./src/index'); const e = new LearningEngine({ autoLoad: false }); console.log('OK: LearningEngine loads'); e.addAntiPattern({ type: 'shotgun_debug', description: 'test', severity: 'high', context: {} }); console.log('OK: addAntiPattern works'); e.addPositivePattern({ type: 'efficient_debug', description: 'test', success_rate: 1.0, context: {} }); console.log('OK: addPositivePattern works'); const advice = e.advise({ task_type: 'debug', attempt_number: 5 }); console.log('OK: advise works, warnings:', advice.warnings.length); const report = e.getReport(); console.log('OK: getReport works, anti-patterns:', report.anti_patterns.total); console.log('All tests passed');"
scripts.report: node -e "const { LearningEngine } = require('./src/index'); const e = new LearningEngine(); console.log(JSON.stringify(e.getReport(), null, 2));"
scripts.ingest: node -e "const { LearningEngine } = require('./src/index'); const e = new LearningEngine(); const r = e.ingestAllSessions(); console.log('Ingested', r.sessions_analyzed, 'sessions.', 'Anti-patterns:', r.total_anti, 'Positive:', r.total_positive, 'Cross-session:', r.cross_session);"

author: jack
